messages.message: I ran into this today too. I have a patch on my branch that fixes this for both webapp and weaviate-titan.

```--- a/third-party/docker/weaviate-titan/Dockerfile
+++ b/third-party/docker/weaviate-titan/Dockerfile
@@ -21,13 +21,12 @@ RUN GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build \
   -o /weaviate-server ./cmd/weaviate-server

 # Final image
-FROM alpine
-RUN apk add --no-cache --upgrade bc ca-certificates openssl \
-    libc6-compat # <--- Added this for glibc compatibility
+FROM 549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/docker-hub/chainguard/wolfi-base:latest (http://549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/docker-hub/chainguard/wolfi-base:latest)
+RUN apk add --no-cache --upgrade bc ca-certificates openssl

 COPY --from=builder /weaviate-server /bin/weaviate

 USER 9999
 EXPOSE 8080
 ENTRYPOINT ["/bin/weaviate"]
-CMD [ "--host", "0.0.0.0", "--port", "8888", "--scheme", "http"]
\ No newline at end of file
+CMD ["--host", "0.0.0.0", "--port", "8888", "--scheme", "http"]```

```--- a/webserver/server-nginx/Dockerfile
+++ b/webserver/server-nginx/Dockerfile
@@ -1,11 +1,11 @@
-FROM jekyll/jekyll:4.2.2 AS webroot
+FROM 549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/docker-hub/jekyll/jekyll:4.2.2 (http://549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/docker-hub/jekyll/jekyll:4.2.2) AS webroot
 RUN gem install public_suffix -v 4.0.7 \
     && gem install addressable -v 2.8.0

 COPY build/webroot/static /webroot/static
 COPY build/fern-docs/src/static /webroot/static/docs/aihub

-FROM cgr.dev/chainguard/wolfi-base:latest AS nginx_modules
+FROM 549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/docker-hub/chainguard/wolfi-base:latest (http://549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/docker-hub/chainguard/wolfi-base:latest) AS nginx_modules
 RUN apk add --no-cache \
         build-base \
         pcre2-dev \
@@ -26,7 +26,7 @@ WORKDIR /nginx_modules
 RUN mv /tmp/nginx/objs/ngx_http_vhost_traffic_status_module.so /nginx_modules


-FROM cgr.dev/chainguard/wolfi-base:latest
+FROM 549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/docker-hub/chainguard/wolfi-base:latest (http://549230430157.dkr.ecr.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/docker-hub/chainguard/wolfi-base:latest)
 LABEL maintainer="Instabase, Inc."
 RUN apk add --no-cache \
         bash \```
Will merge it in a sec
@Cody Boggs wonder if we can DNS block `hub.docker.com (http://hub.docker.com)` from CI to prevent this stuff from leaking in
DNS blocking would be very prone to unexpected and hard-to-diagnose errors in who-knows-what, but I think a small PR check in GH would do the trick
